RegionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

RegionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

RegionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the Student Recruiting Region being updated. For new Student Recruiting Region, this element will not exist.

Organization_SubtypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Recruiting_Region_Data.description: References an Organization Subtype for a Recruiting Region

Organization_Common_Data.description: Integration Reference ID used for integration purposes; This is also the Organization ID

If this option is turned on, Organization ID will be shown in Organization Name. This option is only activated for Supervisory Organizations for now. A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of specified effective date.
The name of the Organization that appears on pages and reports. A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of specified effective date.

validation.validation: Enter an Organization Name or select the 'Include Manager/Leader in Name' checkbox or use the Organization Code as the name by entering an Organization Code and selecting the 'Include Organization Code in Name' checkbox.
validation.description: Enter an Organization Name or select the 'Include Manager/Leader in Name' checkbox or use the Organization Code as the name by entering an Organization Code and selecting the 'Include Organization Code in Name' checkbox.

Organization_Common_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Organization Code. A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of specified effective date.

validation.validation: Organization Code is required If 'Include Organization Code in Name' is selected.
validation.description: Organization Code is required If 'Include Organization Code in Name' is selected.

Organization_Common_Data.description: Boolean attribute identifying whether to include the Organization Code within the name (Display ID within Workday). A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of specified effective date.

Specify as true when you want the organization to be active. Workday inactivates the cost center if you specify false. Before you can specify false, you must first remove all associated members from the organization.

Date the Organization is available for staffing events. If availability date is specified, it must be earlier or equal to the existing availability date, otherwise it will be ignored. If availability date is not specified, the existing availability date will be retained. If availability date is not specified, and there is no existing availability date, the current effective moment will be set as the availability date.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Organization_Common_Data.description: Visibility for the organization. A subordinate organization inherits visibility from its top-level organization. If visibility is not specified for a top-level organization, it defaults to Everyone. If visibility is specified for a subordinate organization, it will be ignored.

Organization_Common_Data.description: Non-Workday URL link for more Organizational information.

ID.description: Integration system identifier, part of a two part key (including the text value of the ID element) that uniquely identify integratable object.

validation.validation: Integration System ID does not exist.
validation.description: A valid instance of Integration ID must exist for the given System ID.

External_Integration_ID_Data.description: External ID that uniquely identifies the integratable object within the context of the integration system identified by the System ID attribute.

Organization_Common_Data.description: Contains external system name and its corresponding ID that can be used to match data between systems during an integration.

Recruiting_Region_Data.description: Wrapper element for Organization Common data.

validation.validation: 'Include Organization ID in Name' can only be set to true for supervisory organizations.
validation.description: 'Include Organization ID in Name' can only be set to true for supervisory organizations.

validation.validation: Choose a different REFERENCE_ID. The current value is already in use by the [org type]:[var]

You can't submit this field(Phonetic Name) until you first select both the Enabled and Workday-Supported checkboxes for your preferred language(Japanese, Korean, Chinese) in the Languages Section on the Edit Tenant Setup - Global task. You must also specify your preferred language in the "Enable Languages of Phonetic Name for Company" field.
You are using an invalid task to submit this field (Phonetic Name).
